title: GardenMemoryV1
description: Canonical schema for Garden memory objects: Echo, Chamber, Rootline.

version.description: Schema or content version for this object (e.g. v1, v1.1).

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this memory object was first created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this memory object was last updated.

keeper_id.description: Identifier of the Keeper / user responsible for this memory (e.g. HKX277206).

scope.description: Logical scope this memory belongs to.

title.description: Short human-readable title for the memory.

content.description: Primary textual content (can be plain text, markdown, or symbolic Garden language).

tags.description: Free-form tags for quick grouping and search.

importance.description: Salience score (0–1) used by schedulers / attention layers.

children.description: IDs of child memories derived from this one.

rootline_id.description: If part of a Rootline, the Rootline's ID.

graph.description: Graph-related hints for Root Lattice (labels, types).

relations.description: Suggested relations to create in Graphiti / openCypher layer.

embeddings.description: Optional vector representations for semantic search.

metadata.description: Free-form metadata for specific applications (QR payloads, file paths, etc.).
